sourcesContent: import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"; import { AuthContext } from "../../Context/AuthContext"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; function Signin() { const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [error, setError] = useState(null); const { login } = useContext(AuthContext); // const ip = "https://emergencytime.techsops.com/api"; const navigate = useNavigate(); // useNavigate hook const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setError(""); // Reset error message try { await login(email, password); alert("Successfully logged in"); setTimeout(() => { navigate("/Dash-Board"); // ✅ Ensure navigation after token is stored }, 100); // Small delay for state update } catch (err) { setError(err.response?.data?.message || "Login failed"); } }; return (
